channel.title: 3D Vision on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 3D Vision on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: 3D Gaussian Splatting as Markov Chain Monte Carlo
item.description: Researchers rethink 3D Gaussian Splatting as MCMC sampling, improving rendering quality and Gaussian control via a novel relocation strategy.

item.title: 3DGS-Enhancer: Enhancing Unbounded 3D Gaussian Splatting with View-consistent 2D Diffusion Priors
item.description: 3DGS-Enhancer boosts unbounded 3D Gaussian splatting, generating high-fidelity novel views even with sparse input data using view-consistent 2D diffusion priors.

item.title: CAT3D: Create Anything in 3D with Multi-View Diffusion Models
item.description: CAT3D: Generate high-quality 3D scenes from as little as one image using a novel multi-view diffusion model, outperforming existing methods in speed and quality.

item.title: Context and Geometry Aware Voxel Transformer for Semantic Scene Completion
item.description: CGFormer: a novel voxel transformer boosting semantic scene completion accuracy by using context-aware queries and 3D deformable attention, outperforming existing methods on SemanticKITTI and SSCBench…

item.title: Dynamic 3D Gaussian Fields for Urban Areas
item.description: 4DGF, a novel neural scene representation, achieves interactive-speed novel view synthesis for large-scale dynamic urban areas by efficiently combining 3D Gaussians and neural fields.

item.title: GIC: Gaussian-Informed Continuum for Physical Property Identification and Simulation
item.description: GIC: Novel hybrid framework leverages 3D Gaussian representation for accurate physical property estimation from visual observations, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: LightGaussian: Unbounded 3D Gaussian Compression with 15x Reduction and 200+ FPS
item.description: LightGaussian achieves 15x compression of 3D Gaussian scene representations, boosting rendering speed to 200+ FPS while maintaining visual quality, solving storage and efficiency issues in real-time n…

item.title: Memorize What Matters: Emergent Scene Decomposition from Multitraverse
item.description: 3D Gaussian Mapping (3DGM) achieves self-supervised camera-only 3D scene decomposition by leveraging multi-traverse driving data, memorizing permanent structures while filtering out transient objects.

item.title: MeshFormer : High-Quality Mesh Generation with 3D-Guided Reconstruction Model
item.description: MeshFormer: High-quality 3D mesh generation from sparse views in seconds, using transformers and 3D convolutions.

item.title: Multistable Shape from Shading Emerges from Patch Diffusion
item.description: A novel diffusion model reconstructs multimodal shape distributions from shading, mirroring human multistable perception.

item.title: PCP-MAE: Learning to Predict Centers for Point Masked Autoencoders
item.description: PCP-MAE enhances point cloud self-supervised learning by cleverly predicting masked patch centers, leading to superior 3D object classification and scene segmentation.

item.title: Physically Compatible 3D Object Modeling from a Single Image
item.description: Single image to physically compatible 3D objects: A new framework ensures 3D models maintain stability and mirror real-world equilibrium states, advancing realism in dynamic simulations and 3D printi…

item.title: Rethinking 3D Convolution in $ll_p$-norm Space
item.description: L1-norm based 3D convolution achieves competitive performance with lower energy consumption and latency compared to traditional methods, as proven through universal approximation theorem and experimen…

item.title: SA3DIP: Segment Any 3D Instance with Potential 3D Priors
item.description: SA3DIP boosts 3D instance segmentation accuracy by cleverly using 3D spatial and textural cues alongside 2D multi-view masks, overcoming limitations of previous methods.

item.title: Tetrahedron Splatting for 3D Generation
item.description: TeT-Splatting: a novel 3D representation enabling fast convergence, real-time rendering, and precise mesh extraction for high-fidelity 3D generation.

item.title: Voxel Mamba: Group-Free State Space Models for Point Cloud based 3D Object Detection
item.description: Voxel Mamba: a group-free 3D object detection method using state space models, achieving higher accuracy and efficiency by overcoming limitations of serialization-based Transformers.

item.title: X-Ray: A Sequential 3D Representation For Generation
item.description: X-Ray: A novel 3D representation generating complete object surfaces from a single image!
